name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vizly - Analyze Google Sheets with AI

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyze and visualize your Google Sheet with AI using Vizly, your AI data scientist. Easily interpret data, create graphs, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🤖 Analyze Google Sheets with ChatGPT-Powered AI

Transform your data into meaningful insights with Vizly, leveraging best-in-class models like OpenAI's GPT-4o and Anthropic's Claude 3.5 Sonnet.

Features:
✏️ Upload Data: Analyze your Google Sheets in seconds.
📈 Create Graphs: Generate interactive charts effortlessly.
📜 Export Insights: Save your findings to DOCX, PDF, IPYNB, or HTML.
🌐 Share Analysis: Turn your data into shareable web apps.
🔍 Customize Results: Tailor graphs and tables to your needs.

Instructions:
1. Install the extension.
2. Go to Google Sheets and open your desired sheet.
3. Click "Analyze with Vizly" in the toolbar.
4. Vizly will open, and you can instantly ask questions and generate visualizations.

Vizly simplifies complex data tasks, making them accessible to everyone. No technical expertise required! Learn more at https://vizly.fyi/.
